channel.title: Officehours on Jenkins X
channel.description: Recent content in Officehours on Jenkins X

item.title: Jenkins X Office Hours - April 19, 2019
item.description: Agenda Update on multi cluster - James Strachan Update on Dogfooding Jenkins X - James Rawlings Update on monitoring - Gareth Evans Update on external dns - Cai Cooper Update on multiple git providers for Prow - Will Refvem Demos: - Multi-cluster - James Strachan - Installing apps using GitOps, with private chart repos - Pete Muir - Creating optional questions for app install - Dave Conde - Jx upgrade app - Pete Muir

item.title: Jenkins X Office Hours - April 4, 2019
item.description: Agenda Rebasing & Batching pull requests - Pete Muir & James Rawlings Provisioning Jenkins X K8s Clusters Using Infrastructure as Code (Terraform) - Oscar Medina Knative Server - James Strachan Multi-select questions for jx add app - Pete Muir jx add app against local filesystem - Pete Muir

item.title: Jenkins X Office Hours - March 21, 2019
item.description: Agenda Overview and demo of DevEnv - Cai Cooper CLI plugins - Pete Muir CloudBees Docs Team (Ashton, Kim, Tammy, John) - want to know how they can help the community with Jenkins X docs :-)

item.title: Jenkins X Office Hours - February 21, 2019
item.description: Agenda [Jenkins X Pipelines](/architecture/jenkins-x-pipelines - [Andrew Bayer]() Container Tests - Gareth Evans

item.title: Jenkins X Office Hours - Archives
item.description: Archives 13th December, 2018 - from KubeCon US 6th September, 2018 9th August, 2018 26th July, 2018 12th July, 2018 17th May, 2018
